instruction: Consider using the MSCI Climate Paris Aligned Index as a benchmark for climate-aware investment strategies.
output: Thank you for suggesting the MSCI Climate Paris Aligned Index as a useful tool for institutional investors seeking to decarbonize their portfolios. We will explore how this benchmark can be integrated into our investment strategy and allocations to address the physical, social, and economic challenges of climate change. We appreciate the support of Oliver Marchand and Phanos Hadjikyriakou for their assistance with the Global Warming Potential model and calculated scenarios, which will help us make more informed and forward-looking decisions.
